descrip:
A fluffy soft bunny that looks like it came straight out of a pastel fairytale!  
           With long adorable ears and a tiny nose, this bunny is perfect for gifting or keeping as your cozy desk buddy.

A pretty handmade crochet top that gives a dreamy, girly aesthetic!  
Perfect for summer, photoshoots, or styling with jeans for a cute look.  
Soft, comfy, and totally Pinterest-worthy

A tiny chubby duck that instantly melts hearts!  
Cute, squishy, and perfect to hang on bags or keep as a sweet reminder of your creativity.  
Guaranteed to make you smile every time

Beautiful handcrafted roses that never fade!  
Perfect for room décor, gifts, or adding a romantic touch to your desk.  
Soft petals + pastel charm = pure elegance

A stylish handmade bag with cottagecore vibes!  
Spacious, adorable, and perfect for carrying small essentials.  
Looks cute with every outfit — a must-have accessory

A cute and classy bookmark made for book lovers!  
Soft, aesthetic, and perfect for adding magic to your reading time.  
Makes your books feel even more special
